Html:
i have a label layer of road name,and a traffic flow layer.

what can i do,if i want to add another tile layer over the mainmap?

I tried to use double "GMapControl",but it didn't work.

radioman,would you like to show me the way?

i want to add a traffic flow layer.

this 'another tile layer' will get tiles from a tile cached service,and i think it can work as the 'MainMap'.

i tried to add another 'GMapControl' ,but it could not work ...
there is no tiles for traffic ;} all you can add is some objects with coordinates

"there is no tiles for traffic", i have such tile service,it has web mercator projection and the same tile index rule.

and i just want to overlap it on the mainmap, can i use two 'GMapControl'?one loads google map and another loads my traffic tiles.
hm.. and whats happens when traffic changes, but tiles are cached?

the traffic flow tiles will be updated regularly. it provides service like google map tiles.

radioman, i want to know, can i use two 'GMapControl' in a Form?
how it will be updated if system puts it first to the local cache?

i set the timer for detecting the traffic tiles server is updated,and then it will get the new tiles replcing the local cache.

now i just want to overlap these traffic tiles on the mainmap,what can i do?
the tiles in cache are not replaced, what will be the point then of the such cache. First basics, then tile stuff...
